intro: Illicium griffithii var. yunnanense, commonly known as Yunnan star anise, is a deciduous shrub native to southwestern China. It belongs to the family Schisandraceae and is characterized by its aromatic, star-shaped fruits that resemble those of the star anise. The plant produces small, white flowers and has dark green, glossy leaves. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its unique fragrance and medicinal properties, it is valued in traditional Chinese medicine.
